frontMatter.title: Promotions Process
frontMatter.metaDescription: A detailed plan including frequency, customer segments, market conditions, offerings, ad-word design, and messages.

checklist.question: Do you have a promotion plan for your product?
checklist.expectation: Your promotion plan should include strategies for Advertising, Personal selling, Sales promotions and Public relations

checklist.question: Have you identified the promotional technique(s) that best suits your product?
checklist.expectation: You should evaluate the effect of Advertising, Sales promotions, Public relations, Personal selling and identify the strengths and weaknesses of those techniques for your product.

checklist.question: Do you have a social media marketing strategy?
checklist.expectation: Social media promotions are an easy way of connecting with customers. You should identify how to use social media promotions effectively for your product.
